sentences.sContent: This feebleminded emperor, he is born to cut date to won't be known possibly by people place forever really.
sentences.sContent_eng: This feebleminded emperor, he is born to cut date to won't be known possibly by people place forever really.
sentences.sCn: 这位意志薄弱的皇帝，他出生的确切日期可能永远不会被人们所知。

synos.tran: 低能的；意志薄弱的；精神薄弱的

words.tran: 微弱的，无力的；虚弱的；薄弱的

trans.tranCn: 低能的；意志薄弱的；精神薄弱的
